about_the_game:
STORY
"Go to, let us build us a city and a tower, whose top may reach unto heaven; and let us make us a name, lest we be scattered abroad upon the face of the whole earth."
Thus, on the land of the ancient country of Parthia, a huge modern city sprang up.
In the center of this steel forest stands a “new babel tower” that goes straight into the sky. This tower connects people scattered all over the land in the “Gnosis net”, spreading the name of the religious order “Bythos” day and night——

Parthia, an ancient civilization, declined for a time in history. But in recent years, under the leadership of the church called “Bythos”, the country has developed a technology called "Gnosis System", and it has rapidly risen to become one of the most powerful countries in the world.
In Sumer province, south of Parthia, a huge modern city rises from a fishing village at the mouth of the sea.
The Curia Babylon was named after “Eridu”, the first city built by the legendary human beings.

Gathered here are the top “Gnosis System” researchers from Sumer and even the world, as well as the company “RABBIS Group” that operates the “Gnosis net”.
According to rumors in the market, the rise of Parthia and the secrets of the “Gnosis net” are hidden in the headquarters of the “RABBIS Group”, the giant building “new babel tower” in Eridu...
SYSTEM
AVG part, this game will integrate elements such as maze exploration and card battles. Players will experience the story that happened in Eridu through different systems in this game.
AVG part:This game will have five main lines and a lot of branching options. Players will experience the story from different perspectives and determine the future direction through multi-week play. A seemingly trivial decision may change the fate of people's lives.


Dungeon crawl part:There are countless rumors and rumors in the streets and alleys of Eridu. Row upon row of high-rise buildings, dark and damp narrow alleys, or cyberspace where control and chaos coexist, there seem to be countless secrets.
Players will explore the secrets of the maze and obtain information while building their own card library.


Card battle part:In the dungeon, danger and opportunity always go hand in hand. Before confronting them, it's best to sort out your clues while holding your weapon.
In this work, players will be able to choose a variety of ways to solve the problem. Persuade or fight, allies or enemies, it's all up to you. However, while trusting others, be prepared to be betrayed by others at any time...

name: 巴别塔

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz 或 AMD A10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: “BABEL” is a card adventure + AVG game with fantasy theme in the near future. Elidu——the largest city in the ancient country Patia, a metropolis jointly controlled by churches and enterprises. Under the seemingly unchanging daily scene, the wheel fortune has quietly begun to turn.
